target: Unfortunately there are no matching restaurants in the North. Would you like to try a different type of cuisine, or a different area?
context: <user>  Hi, I need a hotel that includes free wifi in the north of Cambridge. <system>  Yes I have many listings for that type of hotel,if you tell me your price range I can narrow down your options. <user>  Hotel doesn't need to have free parking. I don't care about price range. <system>  The avalon is a moderately priced guesthouse-type that matches your criteria. <user>  What is the postcode, price range, and address? <system>  The postcode for the Avalon is cb43pd, it is moderately priced hotel, and it is located at 62 gilbert road. <user>  Thank you so much. I am also looking for information on a place to dine in the same area of the hotel. I would prefer international food. <system>
